description: If you're looking for a delicious kombucha cocktail to enjoy all year round, this Sunshine Citrus Kombucha Margarita is the perfect choice! It is a refreshing and slightly tart twist on the classic cocktail. It's made with fresh squeezed orange juice, lime juice, tequila, triple sec,&nbsp;kombucha, and is garnished with chili salt.
